General.Name: Engold Mines Inc
General.Description: EnGold Mines Ltd. explores for and evaluates mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, copper, and silver deposits. It holds 100% interest in the Lac La Hache property covering an area of 25,750 hectares located in the Cariboo region of central British Columbia, Canada. The company was formerly known as GWR Resources Inc. and changed its name to EnGold Mines Ltd. in May 2016. EnGold Mines Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 120-601 West Cordova Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 1G1
